ai-tha-ap180:1.2_0: doesn’t go about with the advantages.
ai-tha-ap180:1.3_0: and having seen the danger in that place,
ai-tha-ap180:3.1_0: if he makes his four eons;
ai-tha-ap180:3.2_0: An gem was situated in the gem.
ai-tha-ap180:3.3_0: I’m not aware of any living creatures.
ai-tha-ap180:4.3_0: The Kings gave them eight Kings.
ai-tha-ap180:6.1_0: That is how these verses were recited by the senior venerable Maṇicūḷaka.
ai-tha-ap180:7.1_0: In the eighth section on the Elder Majjhantika’s instruction.
